channel.title: [Shard] Creativescape
channel.description:
[u]So i want to start a project (for fun), i will be using a shard base specifically Creativescape by R0cky Ownz ( i don't have alot of experience with servers but want to use this anyways ) but want some feedback of what you think of this base and any big problems with this.[/u] [center][b] Also if you know any of the below please pm me or comment (don't tell me to look at Google as i did :) ).[/b][/center] - How to make the server more stable and clean it up a bit. - I have heard this server has random player disconnects dose anyone know how to fix this. - How to get the character files to save in a readable .txt format instead of the .dat format i have looked all over for this (i changed it so it saves as a .txt but it has the unreadable characters i want all of them readable like in Delta or PI.)
Thx in advance and any help would be appreciated. :)

item.title: [Shard] Creativescape
item.dc:creator: @Crown2 Crown2
item.description:
@Crown2 wrote:

IsolatioN:

The character files would have to be redone to use file reader instead. which would mean you’d have to completely redo it. If you have no idea what your doing i wouldn’t start with shard.

okay yah hmm what would you recommend for a base for a begginer other then PI

Read full topic

item.title: [Shard] Creativescape
item.dc:creator: @IsolatioN IsolatioN
item.description:
@IsolatioN wrote:

The character files would have to be redone to use file reader instead. which would mean you’d have to completely redo it. If you have no idea what your doing i wouldn’t start with shard.

item.title: [Shard] Creativescape
item.dc:creator: @Crown2 Crown2
item.description:
@Crown2 wrote:

So i want to start a project (for fun), i will be using a shard base specifically Creativescape by R0cky Ownz ( i don’t have alot of experience with servers but want to use this anyways ) but want some feedback of what you think of this base and any big problems with this.
[center] Also if you know any of the below please pm me or comment (don’t tell me to look at Google as i did ).[/center]

  • How to make the server more stable and clean it up a bit.
  • I have heard this server has random player disconnects dose anyone know how to fix this.
  • How to get the character files to save in a readable .txt format instead of the .dat format i have looked all over for this (i changed it so it saves as a .txt but it has the unreadable characters i want all of them readable like in Delta or PI.)

Thx in advance and any help would be appreciated.

Read full topic
